data.eml:eml: New species of Calamoncosis Enderlein (Diptera: Chloropidae) from South Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wheeler, Terry A., Solecki, Anna M. (2013): New species of Calamoncosis Enderlein (Diptera: Chloropidae) from South Africa. Zootaxa 3702 (4): 379-385, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3702.4.5
